title: The Artificial Mirage
description: A relentless pursuit from Vietnam to Saudi Arabia in which augmented reality distorts the nature of attachment and desire.In a world where augmented reality blurs the line between the real and the computer generated, Charlie cherishes the reality of Lauren.His life as a young American banker in Vietnam seems idyllic until a series of events precipitate her disappearance. When her trail leads to Saudi Arabia, he struggles to find her as he navigates a criminal underworld. The stakes grow higher as it becomes apparent that reality isnâ€™t what it once was.
author: T. Warwick
